pkgmetadata.longdescription: Combinatorial and Statistical Analyses of Rare Events // A custom implementation of the apriori algorithm and binomial tests to identify combinations of features (genes, variants etc) significantly enriched for simultaneous mutations/events from sparse Boolean input, see Vijay Kumar Pounraja, Santhosh Girirajan (2021). doi:10.1101/2021.10.01.462832.
